frontmatter.title: Wendy Liu, Abolish Silicon Valley
frontmatter.subtitle: Presented by the Institute for Digital Public Infrastructure at UMass Amherst
frontmatter.author: Institute for Digital Public Infrastructure
frontmatter.excerpt: Wendy Liu, author of the memoir Abolish Silicon Valley and former start-up founder, joins us to talk about the structural issues of our current tech industry under capitalism. Wendy walks us through a left perspective on Silicon Valley, including the push to organize labor and the toxic incentive structure that values profit and exploitation over public and social good. In addition to publishing her memoir last year, Wendy has been published in Logic Magazine, The Guardian, New Socialist, and Notes from Below.
